We examine the impact of the transformation defined by the integral operator \\( T \\) such that \\( Tg(z) = \\int_0^t e^{iBs}g(z) ds \\), where B is also a constant matrix.

Can we determine the original complex number \\( z_0 \\) at t = 0 after observing \\( Tz(t) \\) at t = T without knowing whether \\( f(z, t) \\) was applied?
